name: C²
description:
Design and name your own little ascii spaceship.

Face off against an AI controlled ship in turn based combat.

Each turn both ships target an opponent's subsystem and shield one of their own. Hitting an unshielded subsystem will do double damage!

Destroy the enemy ship before they destroy yours.

Zip file includes C++ redistributables in the event of a MSVCP140.dll missing  error.
